txt.en: This scroll bestows the Virtues of the Valar quest, which will provide you with several scrolls to improve your Virtues.\n\nYou must be level 50 to accept this quest.

Complete this quest to receive scrolls which will allow you to advance your Virtues to an appropriate tier for level 50.

<rgb=#FFFF00>Important: Make sure to select each virtue you wish to advance before using a virtue scroll!
 -> Open Traits Panel: 'j' 
 -> Select Tab: Virtue Traits
 -> Select Virtue</rgb>
'It is good to see you, friend. I think that you will do nicely and be welcome in assisting a friend.'
This quest grants several scrolls that are used to advance each of your virtues to your new level.\n\nMake sure to select the virtue(s) to advance before consuming each scroll.
Bring the letter to Burt Nine-tales
You may complete this quest at any time.
